name: The Community Center
description:
It was made in 48 hours for the Wholesome Games Jam 2022.

This is a platformer where the player is a poor man trying to reach the community center. However, street boys are trying to stop him.

  • Use W, up arrow or space to jump.
  • Use A, D, right and left arrows to

this is our first 2 days GameJam, we hope you enjoy playing our game!

Credits:

  • LoqDev55 -  Programming, Art, Animations and UX
  • GamerssineDev -  Levels, Art, Sound and UI
  • MauriceDuple6 - Ideas and Art
